## Overview

In this unit, we will discuss the threats to validity in experimental settings. We will also discuss how to address these threats in design, implementation, and analysis. 

## Readings

### Required
- [JPAL:Data Analysis for Social Science](https://www.povertyactionlab.org/resource/data-analysis)
- [EGAP Methods Guide on LATE](https://egap.org/resource/10-things-to-know-about-the-local-average-treatment-effect/)

### Optional
- [Imbens & Wooldridge (2007) Lecture 5 on LATE](https://www2.nber.org/WNE/lect_5_late_fig.pdf)
